reviews.review_msg: He is extremely helpful. He stays behind class (even after this office hours) to talk and that is why he doesn't like discussions in class (time constraints stated in syllabus). His style of teachingtesting challenges your way of thought rather than the way you learn information.
He used five weeks for presentation. I literally learned nothing from this course.
Worst instructor ever. Taking this course is completely a waste of time.

Chris Bastone is the worst professor ever. He doesn't know how to teach, reading his notes all the classes and required a lot of pointless readings. And surprisingly, he didn't finish most of these readings himself. When students pop up some questions about reading, he refused to answer them. AVOID HIM!!
He is one of my best prof. He is very helpful. Too much reading for this course and TA has a problem communicate with students but the prof is really good. I loved this course and enjoyed this class.

Course was interesting; brought a new perspective to technology. Final exam prep was different than most classes. Lectures can be long and dry, but Baston does his best to make them interesting. Shows lots of videos in class.

This guy is probably one of the most useless professors i have ever have had the displeasure of had teach. He badgers with irrelevant personal stories, and has an AWFUL teaching method (where he reads from a piece of paper ALL CLASS). Class exercises are stupid, and TA is not great. My advice: shut off your brain, if  you think, itll drive you mad.
He is serious about teaching, but he is not good at it. His TA absolutely sucks.(worst TA ever had) On top of that, he himself isn't very helpful at all. Do not recommend him for cmpt320.
Enlightening and inspiring. Be prepared to read, research and write. Comp sci students need this perspective!

Most of the work are done in the beginning of the semester. A lot of writing. He uses like 5 weeks to do classroom presentations which are not very helpful (didn't learn much). The TA is not good at English but marks us for English, which is quite frustrating
Class required alot of work. Overall good class. I thought presentations were pointless. It was not a bad class. If i had to take Cmpt 320 i would do it with him again.
Too much reading and 3hrs class is really boring.
